channel.title: General graardor, K'ril Tsutsaroth
channel.description: hi i have a client and i was wondering how do i add like the new npcs like general graardor and K'ril Tsutsaroth thanks

item.title: General graardor, K'ril Tsutsaroth
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

I’ll post the whole tutorial here I give no credits to this, I would give you the link but I can’t find it.

What this Requires :
A Brain
Some Java Knowledge.

What are We gonna do with this Tutorial?
I am gonna Teach you how to make new NPCS With the Models. This is more easier then items.
we are gonna use class5.
heres is an Example of the Code :

if(i == 3000) { // NPC ID, can be changed.
    aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; // Original NPC data, used to collect default emotes and extra NPC info. Don't change this unless you know what you are doing.
    class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data, do not change.
    class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
    class5.aStringArray66[1] = "Attack";
    class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses
    int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
    class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors];
    class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors];
    class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color
    class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color
    class5.anIntArray94[0] = 5000; // Cape model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5001; // Body peice 1 model ID
    class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name
    class5.anInt61 = 624; // NPC combat level
    class5.aByteArray89 = "An huge war chief.".getBytes(); // NPC description, you must leave the .getBytes() at the end or it will not work.
}

class5.anIntArray94[0] = 5000; // Cape model ID class5.anIntArray94[1] = 5001; // Body peice 1 model ID
Are the Model ids. Ive didnt figured out how to recolor the Models.
I will Update topic if i did.
5000 + 5001 Are the Gzipped models. It loads them from your Models folder.
The Current Models of the Bandos bitch are
27785
27789
pick them out of your RuneScape Model Tool Files “Models Folder” W/e
And Gzip them. Change them to 5000 & 5001.
Add these Models to your folder. Now we are gonna add the Models to your cache.
Please run client & login.
Type the following things :
add model 5000
add model 5001
IT ISNT AN COMMAND! ITS JUST SOMETHING YOU HAVE TO TYPE!
Now Restart your Client & add the Code in class8.
Here are some Tips :

aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[630]; // Original NPC data, used to collect default

You see the 630? That corrects the Standing emote & makes it unbuggy. ( Only if it walks its buggy )
If you change it to 0, It will Make it buggy Unless its the correct standing emote.

class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data, do not change.

Dont Change this or else it wont work.

    class5.anIntArray94 = new int[2]; // Number of models the NPC uses

Tells it.

class5.aString65 = "General Graardor"; // NPC name class5.anInt61 = 624; // NPC combat level class5.aByteArray89 = "An huge war chief.".getBytes();
Change this if you want. its nothing special lmao.

And Finnaly!

Here is the Result!

6lvl8gy.jpg768×505

If your Smart you wont get Errors or disconnects or crashing w/e
Remember, Always First add the Models to your cache & then add the Code in class5.

Enjoy Hardcoding!

~Bone Thugs

SWAT wanted all Ints so here they are :

if(i == npcid) { // NPC ID, can be changed.
    aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60.anInt1406 = anIntArray72[0]; // Original NPC data, used to collect default emotes and extra NPC info. Don't change this unless you know what you are doing.
    class5.method165(true, aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_60); // Collect original NPC data, do not change.
    class5.aStringArray66 = new String[5];
    class5.aStringArray66[1] = "masturbate";
    class5.anIntArray94 = new int[14]; // Number of models the NPC uses
    int changedColors = 1; // Number of model colors changed on the NPC
    class5.anIntArray76 = new int[changedColors];
    class5.anIntArray70 = new int[changedColors];
    class5.anIntArray76[0] = 61; // Original model color
    class5.anIntArray70[0] = 926; // Changed model color
    class5.anIntArray94[0] = modelid; // Cape model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[1] = modelid; // Body peice 1 model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[2] = modelid; // Arms model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[3] = modelid; // Hands model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[4] = modelid; // Feet model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[5] = modelid; // Shield model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[6] = modelid; // Body model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[7] = modelid; // Helmet model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[8] = modelid; // Head model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[9] = modelid; // Shadow model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[10] = modelid; // Necklace model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[11] = modelid; // Legs model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[12] = modelid; // Weapon model ID
    class5.anIntArray94[13] = modelid; // Face part (Beard) model ID
    class5.aString65 = "Name"; // NPC name
    class5.anInt61 = 50; // NPC combat level
    class5.aByteArray89 = "penis size.".getBytes(); // NPC description, you must leave the .getBytes() at the end or it will not work.
}

Some Standing Emotes :

Big NPCS :
630
Human :
0
Small NPCS
1150

Read full topic
